0:
auth:
  - user: scans
    group: scans
    uid: 568
    gid: 568
    password: scans
global:
  - "force user = scans"
  - "force group = scans"
  - "create mask = 0644"
  - "directory mask = 0755"
share:
  - name: Scans
    path: /share1
    browsable: yes
    readonly: no
    guestok: no
    comment: "Printer scans"
    veto: yes
host=crtsh-postgres port=5432 dbname=certwatch user=certwatch password=certwatch sslmode=disable

# Default DB connection settings
# conninfo to be supplied via the "-conninfo" command-line parameter.
connopen = 2
connidle = 2
connlife = "10m"

# Default workload settings
interval = "30s"
batch = 20
concurrent = 2

# Other default settings
httptimeout = "30s"
host=crtsh-postgres port=5432 dbname=certwatch user=certwatch password=certwatch sslmode=disable

# Default DB connection settings
# conninfo to be supplied via the "-conninfo" command-line parameter.
connopen = 2
connidle = 2
connlife = "10m"

# Default workload settings
interval = "30s"
batch = 500
concurrent = 50

# Other default settings
httptimeout = "30s"
host=crtsh-postgres port=5432 dbname=certwatch user=certwatch password=certwatch sslmode=disable

# Default DB connection settings
# conninfo to be supplied via the "-conninfo" command-line parameter.
connopen = 2
connidle = 2
connlife = "10m"

# Default workload settings
interval = "30s"
batch = 500
concurrent = 50

# Other default settings
httptimeout = "30s"

---
modules:
  default:
    metrics:
    - name: mcc
      path: "{ .Aggregated_PerSecondStats.Samples }"
      help: Per-second stats aggregated over a minute
      labels:
        environment: test

routers:
- name: Oracle Cloud, Aus East
  network:
    name: oracle-aue
    display_name: oracle-aue
  nos: linux
  address: localhost
  port: 2222
  credential:
    username: ubuntu
    password: ubuntu
  vrfs:
  - name: global
    default: true
    ipv4:
      source_address: 192.0.2.1
    ipv6:
      source_address: 2001:db8::1

[core]
cache_dir = /app/cache
config_dir = /config
data_dir = /app

[logging]
verbosity = 4
format = %(levelname)-8s %(asctime)s [%(process)d:%(threadName)s] %(name)s\n  %(message)s
color = true
config_file =

[audio]
mixer = software
output = audioresample ! audioconvert ! audio/x-raw,rate=48000,channels=2,format=S16LE ! wavenc ! tcpclientsink host=${SVC_SNAPSERVER_ADDR} port=4955
mixer_volume = 45

[file]
enabled = true
media_dirs = /media
show_dotfiles = false
excluded_file_extensions =
.cda
.directory
.html
.jpeg
.jpg
.lnk
.log
.m3u8
.nfo
.nmx
.pdf
.png
.txt
.url
.zip
follow_symlinks = true
metadata_timeout = 1000

[local]
library = sqlite
scan_flush_threshold = 100
media_dir = /media
scan_timeout = 4000
excluded_file_extensions =
.bmp
.cue
.png
.jpg
.jpeg
.doc
.docx
.nfo
.txt
.m3u
.sfv
.zip

[mpd]
hostname = 0.0.0.0
zeroconf = $hostname

[http]
enabled = true
hostname = 0.0.0.0
port = 6680
default_app = iris
zeroconf = $hostname
csrf_protection = false

[tidal]
enabled = false

[scrobbler]
enabled = false

[youtube]
enabled = false

[tunein]
enabled = false

[jellyfin]
hostname = http://jellyfin.${SECRET_DOMAIN}
username = kodi
password = kodi

[spotify]
username = ${SPOTIFY_USERNAME}
password = ${SPOTIFY_PASSWORD}
client_id = ${SPOTIFY_CLIENT_ID}
client_secret = ${SPOTIFY_CLIENT_SECRET}
